message: Accept my generous offer and we can shake on it!
Let's split it down the middle and be done with it!
You're getting a better deal this time, Bob! Accept it!
I'm not getting taken advantage of. You're getting a better deal than me, but I'll give you a slightly better offer this time.
You said I'm getting a better deal, but I'm giving you a better one now! Accept it!
You're not giving me enough. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of again.

You're not giving me enough. I'm starting to get desperate, but I'm not going to give up yet.
